channel.title: Comments on: The absolute luck.
channel.description: Welcome to the home of Battlefield V! Your place for discussion, help, news, reviews, questions, screenshots, videos, gifs, and anything else BFV related! Battlefield V is developed by DICE and produced by EA. This subreddit is ran by dedicated fans of the series and has no affiliation with EA or DICE.

item.title: By: relpmeraggy
item.dc:creator: relpmeraggy
item.description: Nice I had 0-3 the other day. It was close. The best part was there were no obvious cheaters and the teams were balanced. It was great. Too bad that doesnâ€™t happen so often.
item.content:encoded: Nice I had 0-3 the other day. It was close. The best part was there were no obvious cheaters and the teams were balanced. It was great. Too bad that doesnâ€™t happen so often.

item.title: By: flyngmunky
item.dc:creator: flyngmunky
item.description: I still remember playing a game of bf3 on ps3 and it was down to the wire. A lot of people stopped spawning I'm when we got sub 25 tickets (both teams) and t was a hard fought loss. One of the best games ever!
item.content:encoded: I still remember playing a game of bf3 on ps3 and it was down to the wire. A lot of people stopped spawning I’m when we got sub 25 tickets (both teams) and t was a hard fought loss. One of the best games ever!
